author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CHANTAL STRENGTHENS... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS EXPECTED TO BEGIN IN THE WARNING AREA THIS EVENING...
summary: ...CHANTAL STRENGTHENS... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS EXPECTED TO BEGIN IN THE WARNING AREA THIS EVENING... As of 2:00 PM EDT Sat Jul 05 the center of Chantal was located near 31.6, -78.7 with movement N at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Chantal (AT3/AL032025)
